author: cruachan69
title: Great customer service!
text: The hotel was pleasant and clean. The staff were very friendly indeed and I was particularly delighted with their service regarding a suit I accidentally left behind in the wardrobe. They emailed me alerting me to the fact I had forgotten it; and then posted it to me - I live in the far north of Scotland and so it wouldn't be cheap - and what's more refused to take any payment for the postage. I was delighted with their helpfulness.
